title: Fifty Shades of Grey : U.S. sales figures in 2012 , by platform
summary: The statistic shows Number of Shades users in the Fifty in 2012 , sorted figures 2012 .
During the survey period , it was found that 29 millions of the Digital copies were Shades users .
Overall , 15 millions of the Shades Grey U.S. copies accessed the Shades .
gold: The statistic presents U.S. sales figures of the 'Fifty Shades of Grey ' trilogy in 2012 , broken down by platform.
The book sold 29 million print and 15 million digital copies in 2012.
It topped the 2012 best-seller lists in the categories adult fiction and romance .
